  Update Notes:
  =============

  Changelog:

  - The problem preventing the game form starting on hexacore 
    (or above) systems has been fixed

  Instructions:
  =============

  * Unpack the update and run flt-r3tlu1.exe
  * Select the folder of your installation and click 'install'
  * Wait for the patching to finish
  * Play the game
